name: create_zoho_ticket
description: Creates a support ticket in Zoho Desk when a customer needs help, reports an issue, or requests assistance that requires follow-up. IMPORTANT: Before calling this tool, you MUST have collected: (1) customer's email address, (2) a clear subject summarizing the issue, and (3) detailed description of what the problem is. Only use this tool after gathering all required information from the customer.

request_body_schema.description: Request body for creating a Zoho Desk support ticket. The agent MUST collect subject and description from the customer before calling this tool.

properties.name: subject
properties.description: YOU must write a brief, clear summary of the customer's issue based on what they told you. Max 255 characters. Example: 'Dashboard loading slowly for all 50 users since yesterday'

properties.name: description
properties.description: YOU must write a detailed explanation (2-3+ sentences) based on the conversation. Include: what the customer was trying to do, what went wrong, when it started, how many users affected, any error messages mentioned. Example: 'Customer reports the dashboard has been loading very slowly since yesterday morning. All 50 users in their organization are affected. Pages that normally load in 2 seconds are now taking 30+ seconds. No error messages, just slow performance.'

properties.name: email
properties.description: Customer's email address for follow-up communication. This MUST be collected at the start of every conversation.

properties.name: priority
properties.description: Urgency level: High (service down, critical issue), Medium (feature not working, moderate impact), Low (general inquiry, minor issue)

properties.name: departmentId
properties.description: Department ID for routing. Use 1214071000000006907 for general inquiries, 1214071000000390035 for bugs/support, 1214071000000402481 for new features. Leave empty for default routing.
